## AuthenticationConfiguration.certificatePath property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The path to a PEM-encoded public/private key certificate on the filesystem. Default value comes from M365\_CERTIFICATE\_PATH environment variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly certificatePath?: string;
```
